Detailed Description

template<class Base>
class ibase::TLoggerWrap< Base >

Class wrapper implementing interface istd::ILogger sending log messages over ibase::IMessageConsumer.

Access to interface ibase::IMessageConsumer must be registered by user. To register it use interface ibase::ILoggable implemented by this wrapper.

true, if it was possible to send this message and it is 'consumed'.
